definitions.text: bring into conformity with rules or principles or usage; impose regulations
examples: We cannot regulate the way people dress

definitions.text: direct or strongly influence the behavior of
examples: His belief in God governs his conduct

definitions.text: exercise authority over; as of nations
examples: Who is governing the country now?

definitions.text: require to be in a certain grammatical case, voice, or mood
examples: most transitive verbs govern the accusative case in German
